item.description:
Coconuts Rock & Roll Comedy Band with special guest Hypnotist Dan LaRosa

We have secured an online $5 group discount to this VERY ENTERTAINING SHOW - ONLY $20 for members!

The Coconuts Rock & Roll Comedy Band with special guest Hypnotist Dan LaRosa. This show will have you laughing from their first note to the final chord! Get hypnotized with the sensational Dan LaRosa and his hypnotic world of hilarious comedy routines. A roving magician will also entertain the crowd.
Doors open: 7:00 / Show: 8:00.

Click Here For Details

All Details Are Available At: http://www.CTNites.co...

CLICK HERE FOR TICKET PRICES
